comment: /**  * This endpoint is a singleton so that the temporary destination instances are shared across all  * producers and consumers of the same endpoint URI  *  * @return true  */
code: /**  * This endpoint is a singleton so that the temporary destination instances are shared across all  * producers and consumers of the same endpoint URI  *  * @return true  */ public boolean isSingleton() {     return true. }

public synchronized Destination getJmsDestination(Session session) throws JMSException {     if (jmsDestination == null) {         jmsDestination = createJmsDestination(session).     }     return jmsDestination. }
protected Destination createJmsDestination(Session session) throws JMSException {     return session.createTemporaryQueue(). }
